languages.text: {n}Лица бродяг светлеют, они с поклонами принимают подачку.{/n} "Вот спасибо, вот благодарствуем! Хоть будет, на что еды добыть. А то мы вас своим супом тушили. А он всего-то позавчерашний!"

{n}The vagrants' faces brighten, and they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank you kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only two days old!"
languages.original_text: {n}Лица бродяг светлеют, они с поклонами принимают подачку.{/n} "Вот спасибо, вот благодарствуем! Хоть будет, на что еды добыть. А то мы вас своим супом тушили. А он всего-то позавчерашний!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The vagrants' faces brighten, they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank ya kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only from two days ago!"

{n}The vagrants' faces brighten, they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank ya kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only from two days ago!"

{n}The vagrants' faces brighten, and they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank you kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only two days old!"

{n}The vagrants' faces brighten, and they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank you kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only two days old!"

{n}The vagrants' faces brighten, and they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank you kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only two days old!"

languages.text: {n}流浪汉的脸上露出了笑容。他们鞠了一躬，接受了你的施舍。{/n}“噢，谢谢你！真的谢谢你！终于能买点吃的东西了。我是说，你看，我们刚刚为了救你，把我们的汤都泼出去了，而且那些汤只放了两天！”
languages.original_text: {n}The vagrants' faces brighten, and they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank you kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only two days old!"

traits.locale_text: {n}流浪汉的脸上露出了笑容。他们鞠了一躬，接受了你的施舍。{/n}“噢，谢谢你！真的谢谢你！终于能买点吃的东西了。我是说，你看，我们刚刚为了救你，把我们的汤都泼出去了，而且那些汤只放了两天！”

languages.text: {n}Las caras de los mendigos se iluminan y aceptan tus dádivas con una reverencia.{/n} «¡Gracias, muchísimas gracias! Con esto podremos comprar algo de comida. Porque, verá, hemos usado la sopa para apagarle. ¡Y solo llevábamos dos días con ella!».
languages.original_text: {n}The vagrants' faces brighten, and they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank you kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only two days old!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Las caras de los mendigos se iluminan y aceptan tus dádivas con una reverencia.{/n} «¡Gracias, muchísimas gracias! Con esto podremos comprar algo de comida. Porque, verá, hemos usado la sopa para apagarle. ¡Y solo llevábamos dos días con ella!».

languages.text: {n}浮浪者たちの表情が明るくなり、頭を下げながら施しを受け取った。{/n}「ああ、ありがたい、ありがたい！これで食料が買える。実はあんたの火を消すために皆のスープをぶっかけたんだ。まだ2日前のだったから少し残念でね！」
languages.original_text: {n}The vagrants' faces brighten, and they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank you kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only two days old!"

traits.locale_text: {n}浮浪者たちの表情が明るくなり、頭を下げながら施しを受け取った。{/n}「ああ、ありがたい、ありがたい！これで食料が買える。実はあんたの火を消すために皆のスープをぶっかけたんだ。まだ2日前のだったから少し残念でね！」

languages.text: {n}Die Gesichter der Vagabunden hellen sich auf, und sie nehmen dein Geschenk mit einer Verbeugung entgegen.{/n} "Oh, danke, danke vielmals! Damit kaufen wir uns etwas zu essen. Wir haben Euch nämlich mit unserer Suppe gelöscht, müsst Ihr wissen. Und die war erst zwei Tage alt!"
languages.original_text: {n}The vagrants' faces brighten, and they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank you kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only two days old!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gesichter der Vagabunden hellen sich auf, und sie nehmen dein Geschenk mit einer Verbeugung entgegen.{/n} "Oh, danke, danke vielmals! Damit kaufen wir uns etwas zu essen. Wir haben Euch nämlich mit unserer Suppe gelöscht, müsst Ihr wissen. Und die war erst zwei Tage alt!"

languages.text: {n}Le regard des vagabonds s'illumine, puis ils s'inclinent en acceptant votre don.{/n} « Oh, merci, mille mercis ! Ça nous permettra d'acheter à manger. Parce qu'on s'est servis de notre soupe pour éteindre le feu, voyez. Dire qu'on l'avait faite y a à peine deux jours ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The vagrants' faces brighten, and they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank you kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only two days old!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard des vagabonds s'illumine, puis ils s'inclinent en acceptant votre don.{/n} « Oh, merci, mille mercis ! Ça nous permettra d'acheter à manger. Parce qu'on s'est servis de notre soupe pour éteindre le feu, voyez. Dire qu'on l'avait faite y a à peine deux jours ! »

languages.text: {n}Berduşların yüzü parlıyor, önünde eğilerek sadakayı kabul ediyorlar.{/n} "Aman, ne gerek vardı? Sağ olun var olun! Sayenizde biraz olsun karnımız doyacak. Çorbamızı sizi söndürmeye harcamıştık da. Hem de daha iki günlüktü!"
languages.original_text: {n}The vagrants' faces brighten, and they accept your handout with a bow.{/n} "Oh, thank you, thank you kindly! Something to buy a bit of food with. 'Cause, well, we used our soup to put you out, you see. And it was only two days old!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Berduşların yüzü parlıyor ve sadakayı eğilerek kabul ediyorlar.{/n} "Ah, teşekkür ederiz. Çok teşekkür ederiz! Bununla biraz yemek alabiliriz. Sizi söndürmek için çorbamızı kullandık çünkü. Hem de daha iki günlüktü!"
